description: This file initializes and runs an Express.js server, setting up the server to listen on a specified port and address. It also handles graceful shutdown upon receiving a SIGTERM signal and exports the server instance.

methods.name: app.listen
methods.description: Starts the Express application server on specified port and host.

methods.name: process.on
methods.description: Sets up an event listener for process signals, specifically SIGTERM for graceful shutdown.

methods.name: server.close
methods.description: Closes the HTTP server, stopping it from accepting new connections.

methods.name: console.log
methods.description: Logs messages to the console for server status and signals.

methods.name: process.exit
methods.description: Exits the process with a specified status code.
